meanings.sent1: The nonresistant fabric allowed the wind to pass through easily.
meanings.sent2: The child remained nonresistant during the peaceful protest.
meanings.sent3: The nonresistant puppy simply wagged its tail at the approaching stranger.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a nonresistant sponge, absorbing all the new information effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The nonresistant nature of the material made it ideal for flexible applications.

meanings.sent1: The nonresistant patient showed no response to the loud noise.
meanings.sent2: The nonresistant plants stayed unaffected by the sudden change in temperature.
meanings.sent3: The nonresistant alarm clock failed to wake up the heavy sleeper.
meanings.sent4: His nonresistant attitude towards criticism surprised his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The nonresistant behavior of the computer system led to its vulnerability to viruses.
